text:
​Leave it to Khlo é Kardashian to have the most luxurious baby shower ever! Thankfully, this ​pregnancy isn't being hidden like her half-sister Kylie's was , so we're seeing all the action in real time.

A source tells ​E! News the celebration was held in the Grand Ballroom at the Hotel Bel Air in Los Angeles this afternoon.





"They went all out for the shower with no expense spared and it's turned out to be stunning and gorgeous," the source says .

Those in attendance for sure were of course Kris, Kendall, and Kylie Jenner, as well as Real Housewives of Atlanta star Kim Zolciak-Biermann, her daughter, and many more.





And the celebration was SERIOUSLY pink! Check out the awesome photos so far.

Kim and Kylie took to their Snapchats to post several videos and photos of the big event. This party looks fit for a princess, which Khlo é 's daughter for sure will be!

We're now just waiting on the news of the name Khlo é and Tristan pick for their baby girl. Will they use the "K" family tradition? Koko says she's considering it!

I think a T but a K is an option as well. That’s as far as I know https://t.co/Rs6zPdI0BT — Khloé (@khloekardashian) March 5, 2018

​​We only have a short time to find out, as Khloe is very, very pregnant right now. We can't wait for the newest family member in this power squad!





Kylie has also posted another video of Stormi today, with BFF Jordyn Woods. We're not sure if this is at the baby shower or not, but it's definitely from earlier this afternoon.





Try not to melt!

What a perfect family, seriously!
title: Khloé Kardashian Celebrates Beautiful Baby Shower With Family and Friends
